thread.title: This Man Got To Sit Front Row At NYFW Because Everyone Thought He Was Sisqó
thread.title_full: This Man Got To Sit Front Row At NYFW Because Everyone Thought He Was Sisqó

author: Sylvia Obell
title: This Man Got To Sit Front Row At NYFW Because Everyone Thought He Was Sisqó
text:
“I never said I was Sisqó,” said Fake Sisqó .”People thought I was him, and that wasn’t cool.” He refused to say who he really is. ID: 10558085 5. Intentional or not, more than a few people got a laugh out of this entire story: Not all heroes wear capes
— Patrick Monahan (@pattymo) ID: 10558128 The wildest thing about this is that there are advantages to being Sisqo in 2017. https://t.co/yRzmhrpPqt
— OMG, LaJethro (@LaJethroJenkins) ID: 10558166 It's 2017 and there's a dude pretending to be Sisqó so he can sit front row at fashion week events https://t.co/EHtOwW2TOI
— Bryan Hood (@bahood) ID: 10558129 @Independent god hope he didn't "unleash the dragon"
— Commodity Hunter (@BermudaBat) ID: 10558132 High fashion crowds pride themselves on an eye for detail and being able to spot a fake. But all of em' were partying with a faux Sisqó. Lol
— No-Action Brunson (@GodHamgod) ID: 10558167 I'm embarrassed 4 anyone who thinks that man looks anything like Sisqó: Man pretending to be Sisqó crashes NYFW… https://t.co/Q740ISEn1F
— Rebecca Brown (@Rebecca_NYC) ID: 10558131 The best part about being the Fake Sisqó is getting front row seats at fashion week. Worst part? Dragon tattoos.
— ItsTheReal (@itsthereal) ID: 10558133 THERE CAN BE ONLY ONE @OfficialSisQo! https://t.co/8KW38pzuiD
— Greg Miller (@GameOverGreggy) ID: 10558134 Faux sisqo is my fave story this week
— Alex Hutson (@alexandrahutson) ID: 10558135 Be the Sisqó you want to see in the world https://t.co/E6MH1zUaE3
— SPIN (@SPIN) ID: 10558137 2017 & we all STILL look alike?How can't you tell this negro was NOT Sisqó?NYFW crowd, stick to spotting fake Chane… https://t.co/WbmqeIDlh3
— Chakra Khan (@spaceship_nappy) ID: 10558169 16. Meanwhile, the real Sisqo is currently in Las Vegas on tour. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com His management told Page Six they have no idea who Fake Sisqó is but, “it’s flattering, I guess.”
ID: 10558150 17. Guess we should just file this one under ‘2017’! View this image ›
ID: 10558156
